while t:

    print(max(m, n - m))

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    A = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
    if N == 1:
        print(1)
        continue
    zeros = A.count(0)
    if zeros == 0:
        print(N)
        continue
    if zeros == N:
        print(N)
        continue
    ans = max(N - zeros, zeros)
    print(ans)

ans = ''
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    cnt = arr.count(0)
    maxcount = max(cnt, n - cnt)
    ans += str(maxcount) + '\n'
print(ans)
